title: Any ideas for a design for my band called pongoe?
content:
hey ive started a band called pongoe and we need a logo really badly, we are a emo-new wave- alternative-post modern rock band and pongoe is the name of which weve decided on. pongoe is a twist on the "genus" of the ape and human "family" hominidae called pongo, which refers to maias, mawas, and orangutans. dont ask   
   
we like orange red blue and green
author: theaterfreak66
